ygData.subject: Fight? What Fight? Who say Fight?
ygData.msgSnippet: StarFlier:: She smiled and looked at Hydras. So then, uh, what shall we do sir? I mean, what s the game plan to take out those who want to hurt us?

StarFlier::

She smiled and looked at Hydras. "So then, uh, what shall we do sir? 
I mean, what's the game plan to take out those who want to hurt us?"
